description: The OS-DCF:diskconfig when creating a server should not be converted to a bool from a string during the xml deserialization as the extension expects a string.
title: OS-DCF:diskconfig attribute bad xml conversion

comments.content: The OS-DCF:diskconfig when creating a server should not be converted to a bool from a string during the xml deserialization as the extension expects a string.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/23889
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/23889
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/1759d5825c8207492c8960711130d9eb85e5d631
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 1759d5825c8207492c8960711130d9eb85e5d631
Author: Christopher Yeoh <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Mar 8 14:55:54 2013 +1100

    Fix OS-DCF:diskconfig XML handling
    
    Removes string to bool conversion for the OS-DCF:diskconfig
    attribute during XML deserialising as the diskconfig extension
    expects a string (MANUAL or AUTO) not a bool.
    
    Fixes bug 1152439
    
    Change-Id: Id9a5c2559a2891c2a21c437c9a5a534b9885c9bf
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
